    Score scale Calculates the scale scores.

    score_scale.Rd

    Score scale Calculates the scale scores.

    score_scale(
  data,
  filter,
  scale = NULL,
  subscale = NULL,
  subscale_2 = NULL,
  bind = FALSE,
  sum = FALSE,
  min_valid = 1,
  max_na = NA,
  label = NULL,
  FUN = NULL,
  ...
)

    Arguments

    data

    A data frame

    filter

    A logical expression for any dic attribute (e.g. scale == "ITRF" & subscale == "Int")

    bind

    If set TRUE, returns the complete data frame. If set false, returns a data frame with the new score variables for each scale.

    sum

    If TRUE, function mean(x, na.rm = TRUE) is applied for buiding the scores. If FALSE, function sum(x, na.rm = TRUE) is applied. When argument FUN is set, `sum` is ignored.

    min_valid

    Minimal number of valid values that is required for calculating the mean. A value between 0 and 1 indicates a proportion of values (e.g., 0.5 = 50 percent of values have to be valid).

    max_na

    Maximum number of NAs that are allowed before returning NA. A value between 0 and 1 indicates a proportion of values (e.g., 0.5 = 50 percent NAs are allowed).

    label

    A character string with a label for the resulting score variable. Automatically generated if label is not set.

    FUN

    A function for calculating the score (e.g., median)

    ...

    Further arguments passed to the FUN function (e.g., na.rm = TRUE)

    Value

    A data frame

    Contents

    Developed by Juergen Wilbert.
